text:
The following RewriteRule worked without problems for a long time, but no longer in 2.2.9 (worked up to 2.2.6; .7 and .8 not tested)

RewriteRule ^/(.)_(.*).htm$ http://server/script?Test1=$1&Test2=$2 [NC,NE,P]

in 2.2.9 the server receives the request
GET /script
from the proxy, without the querystring parameters

when removing the NE-Flag, the rule works as intended

Maybe this is an effect of the change done in 44803
creator: markus.lind@yellowmap.de

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 45247 ***
creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
